power.name: Insight
power.text: 1 player draws 2 cards, then discards 1 card

card.name: Information Overload
card.text: Tattletale may use any number of powers this turn. Every time Tattletale uses a power this turn, she deals herself 1 psychic damage

card.name: It's Always in the First Place I Look
card.text: A player may search their deck for 1 card and put it into their hand, then shuffle their deck

card.name: Out of Commission
card.text: Tattletale regains 5 HP. Immediately end your turn

card.name: Domino Mask
card.text: You may use an additional power in your power phase

card.name: Constant Smile
card.text: At the start of your turn, Tattletale deals each non-hero target 1 psychic damage

card.name: Confidence
card.text: At the start of your turn, each hero regains 1 HP

card.name: Follows All the Threads
card.text: Play with the top card of all decks face-up. At the start of your turn, Tattletale deals herself 1 psychic damage.

card.name: Quick Insight
card.text: Whenever a target enters play, Tattletale may reveal the bottom card of a deck, then either put it on the top or the bottom of that deck. If you do, Tattletale deals herself 1 psychic damage

card.name: Taking a Risk
card.power: Play the top card of a deck

card.name: Reading
card.power: Reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Put 1 on the top and 2 on the bottom

card.name: Witty Deflection
card.power: Select a hero target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another hero target

card.name: Spot the Flaw
card.text: When this card enters play, Tattletale deals herself 2 psychic damage. Damage dealt by hero targets is irreducible. At the start of your turn, destroy this card
